snippet: With a June 30 deadline looming to reach a nuclear agreement, Iran and the United States appeared headed toward a possible confrontation over the airline’s purchase of nine used Airbus jetliners.
abstract: United States and Iran, nearing June 30 deadline on nuclear talks, seem to be steering toward possible tangle over purchase of nine used Airbus jetliiners by Mahan Air, Iranian airline blacklisted under US sanctions.
lead_paragraph: With a June 30 deadline looming to reach a nuclear agreement, Iran and the United States appeared headed toward a possible confrontation over the airline’s purchase of nine used Airbus jetliners.

headline.main: Sales to Mahan Air Blacklisted by U.S. Hang Over Iran Talks
headline.print_headline: Blacklisting of Airline Casts Cloud on Iran Talks
